summary: FULL VERIFICATION RUN COMPLETED - Comprehensive testing of AAVE V3 flash loan arbitrage bot on Base chain. All backend APIs (11/11) and frontend UI components (13/13) passing at 100%. Bot integrates with 7 DEXes: Uniswap V2, Uniswap V3, PancakeSwap V3, Aerodrome, SushiSwap V3, BaseSwap, Odos aggregator. Dashboard fully functional with real-time data display, settings persistence, and proper navigation.
passed_tests: GET /api/health - Returns 200 with status ok and service name
GET /api/stats - Returns complete stats with 13 fields including total_trades, win_rate, total_profit_eth, etc.
GET /api/opportunities - Returns opportunities array with proper fields
GET /api/trades - Returns trades array with all required fields
GET /api/logs - Returns logs array with timestamp, level, message
PUT /api/settings - Successfully updates and persists changes (verified max_gas_price_gwei change)
GET /api/status - Returns bot status with network field = 'base'
6 stat cards populated with live values (Net Profit: +1.3416 ETH, Win Rate: 100%, etc.)
Opportunities tab shows table with 7 columns and multi-DEX arbitrage paths
Trades tab shows table with 8 columns and successful trades
TX hash links correctly point to basescan.org
Settings panel opens and shows all 9 configurable fields
Settings save functionality works and persists changes
Live Logs panel shows 30+ log entries with timestamps and severity levels
Footer displays 'AAVE V3 Flash Loans' and 'Base Mainnet'
Tab navigation between Opportunities and Trades works correctly
Refresh button is clickable and functional
